se.starbox.models

Class UserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.starbox.models.UserModel

  • public class UserModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A Model class for executing tasks related to the contact list. Keeps an internal list of current users in the contact list, aswell as a file representation (in users.xml)
    Author:
    jens, walter

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String ip,
           java.lang.String email,
           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String group)
        Add a user to the contact list ( IP and email are required, rest are optional)
        Parameters:
        ip - the IP address of the contact
        email - the email address of the contact
        name - the name of the contact
        group - the group the contact belongs to
        status - the status of the contact(pending,accepted,denied)

        Parameters:

        newName - the new display name
